scripts.test:coverage: cd EMARVE/backend && go test ./tests/unit/controllers/... -cover -coverprofile=coverage.out && go tool cover -html=coverage.out -o coverage.html
scripts.install: npm run install:backend && npm run install:frontend
scripts.install:backend: cd EMARVE/backend && go mod tidy && go mod download
scripts.clean: npm run clean:backend && npm run clean:frontend
scripts.clean:backend: cd EMARVE/backend && go clean -cache && rm -f coverage.out coverage.html
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend
scripts.lint:frontend: cd EMARVE/frontend/front && npm run lint || echo 'Linter del frontend no configurado'
scripts.format: npm run format:backend && npm run format:frontend
scripts.format:frontend: cd EMARVE/frontend/front && npm run format || echo 'Formatter del frontend no configurado'
scripts.dev: npm run install && npm run test
scripts.ci: npm run install && npm run test:coverage && npm run lint
scripts.stats: echo 'ðŸ“Š EstadÃ­sticas del Proyecto' && echo '==========================' && echo 'Backend:' && cd EMARVE/backend && echo '  Archivos Go:' $(find . -name '*.go' | wc -l) && echo 'Frontend:' && cd EMARVE/frontend/front && echo '  Archivos JS/TS:' $(find . -name '*.js' -o -name '*.ts' -o -name '*.jsx' -o -name '*.tsx' | wc -l)
